other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to parent

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect of new accounting principle in period of adoption

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value new issues

adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
stock issued during period value share based compensation

stock repurchased and retired during period value

__unmapped__: minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
other comprehensive income loss net of tax portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
shares paid for tax withholding for share based compensation
